units.name: Ruby Fundamentals I
units.description: Learn how to write basic expressions and make decisions in the Ruby programming language.

quizzes.name: Expressions Pre-Quiz
questions: What is the value of x + 1?
If x = 5, what is the value of x + 1?
What is the value of the expression `"banana".capitalize`?

units.name: Ruby Fundamentals II
units.description: Learn how model data and define abstractions in the Ruby programming language.
